decks.notes: The main focus of this Golos, Tireless Pilgrim control deck is to utilize a wide range of versatile cards to control the game and outvalue your opponent. The deck includes a mix of removal spells, card advantage engines, ramp, and powerful win conditions. With Golos as the commander, the goal is to ramp into powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End or Ugin, the Spirit Dragon while disrupting your opponent's game plan with cards like Damnation, Thoughtseize, and Abrupt Decay. The deck aims to grind out the game with its efficient removal and card advantage, eventually overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats and resource advantage.

The focus of this deck is on controlling your opponent's resources and dominating the game through disruption and removal spells. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Duress, you aim to strip your opponent's hand of important cards while also using targeted removal like Fatal Push and Damnation to handle threats on the board. Your commander, Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, allows you to recur important creatures from the graveyard and apply pressure on your opponent. With powerful spells like Demonic Tutor and Dark Petition, you can search for key combo pieces or answers as needed. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting your opponent and grinding out a win through attrition.

The deck focuses on utilizing Kelsien, the Plague as the commander to deal direct damage to creatures, planeswalkers, and opponents. It includes a mix of low-cost aggressive creatures, removal spells, and equipment to control the board and pressure opponents. Key elements include cards like Anointed Peacekeeper, Arid Mesa, Demonic Tutor, Fatal Push, Lightning Bolt, Mother of Runes, Skullclamp, Stoneforge Mystic, and Swords to Plowshares to maintain board presence and disrupt opponent strategies. The goal is to efficiently remove threats and protect Kelsien while dealing damage to opponents, ultimately winning through combat damage and targeted abilities. Land consistency and mana fixing are also prioritized to ensure smooth gameplay and effective aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo utilizing Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice as the commander. The deck includes a variety of cards that enhance auras and equipment, enabling Light-Paws to become a potent threat on the battlefield. By equipping Light-Paws with various enchantments and artifacts, the deck aims to create an unstoppable force that can quickly overwhelm the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive cards like Drannith Magistrate and Thalia, Heretic Cathar to hinder the opponent's strategy. The goal is to create a fast-paced, aggressive gameplay that can disrupt the opponent's plans while building up a lethal combo with Light-Paws at the center.

The focus of this deck is utilizing the graveyard to combo off and win the game efficiently. By using cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Dance of the Dead, along with sacrificing creatures and utilizing various rituals, the deck aims to quickly assemble powerful combinations that can overwhelm the opponent. The commander, Old Stickfingers, provides additional utility and synergy with graveyard interactions. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt opponents' strategies, along with removal spells like Abrupt Decay and Assassin's Trophy to deal with threats. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to leverage the graveyard as a resource to set up game-winning combos and outmaneuver opponents in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 format.
